summary: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.
cast: Mariya Smolnikova|Yanina Studilina|Pyotr Fyodorov|Thomas Kretschmann|Sergey Bondarchuk|Dmitriy Lysenkov|Andrey Smolyakov|Aleksey Barabash|Oleg Volku|Heiner Lauterbach|Polina Raykina|Anna von Haebler|Yuriy Nazarov|Mariya Sittel|Petar Zekavica|Dmitriy Kochkin|Georges Devdariani|Philippe Reinhardt|Christoph Gawenda|Oksana Bazilevich|Svetlana Svirko|Nataliya Kadochnikova|Valentin Kuznetsov|Roman Likhodeev|Aleksandr Suvorov|Ivan Debov|Mikhail Bogdanov|Evgeniy Levitskiy|Oleg Tilkin|Maksim Yakovlev|Kirill Varaksa|Nodar Dzhanelidze|Yan Kuzmin|Aleksandr Pangaev|Aleksandr Ivanov|Yuriy Utkin|Aleksandr Petrov|Sergey Trebesov|Nikolay Pavlov|Sergey Petrov|Evgeniy Tsurko|Vladimir Shagin|Egor Kelli|Valeriy Li|Igor Sigov
title: Stalingrado
